title: ITV2's Killer Camp contestant Warren killed off by penis through eye
text:
Warren was murdered on tonight’s Killer Camp (Picture: ITV)

ITV2’s Killer Camp just aired one of the most creative deaths in the history of television getting us well and truly into the Halloween spirit.

The end of tonight’s episode saw contestant Warren killed off by Bruce, who was under strict orders from the so-far anonymous murderer.

But this wasn’t just any old departure, oh no, because Warren met his maker when a statue’s penis impaled his eyeball.

We told you this show is like Love Island meets your favourite slasher!

Describing Warren’s horrific end to the rest of the Killer Camp cohort, Camp Leader Bobby Mair revealed that the unfortunate hopeful had stumbled across a clearing.

‘At the centre of the clearing was an enormous statue of a Greek god, an ancient deity representing fertility,’ he said.

‘He [Warren] was in awe of the beauty and grace of the statue, but most of all, it’s big f****** d***. I mean, this thing had a big d***.

The statue’s penis went straight through Warren’s eye (Picture: ITV)

‘He moved closer to the statue, he brushed away some moss revealing the words, “Phallus Impallus”.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Suddenly, the d*** on the statue hit a cloud of smoke. Splat, it went through his eye, right up to the testicles. And there was blood everywhere.’

Yep, we’re completely speechless too.

Viewers were shook by Warren’s creative death on Killer Camp

Jesus Christ, what a way to die 😳😂 @warrenspencer_ bloody gutted man, you were my pick!! #KillerCamp — Kev 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 (@kevlaa132) October 28, 2019

SOMEONE ON ITV2 JUST GOT IMPALED IN THE FACE BY A STONE PENIS AND I STOOD UP AND APPLAUDED #KillerCamp — Nick Walker (@nickw84) October 28, 2019

That was absolute gold. This is the barmiest thing on TV #KillerCamp — Joshua Dixon (@JoshDixonTweets) October 28, 2019

Well that was quite the death. Really brings meaning to "you'll have someone's eye out with that."#KillerCamp — Daniel Peake (@danielpeake) October 28, 2019

😂😂😂😂😂😂 death by 🍆 I live this ridiculous show 😂😂😂 #KillerCamp — Kayleigh Taylor (@kayleighxtaylo1) October 28, 2019

turned on the end of #KillerCamp thinking it was some fun reality show only to see someone “die” from a penis blowing up. i wish that was a typo. what even is british tv nowadays — Robyn (@rxbyndavidson) October 28, 2019

How long has this been going? Not watched before but bloody hell this is good! Finishing with a death by penis through the brain 🤣 #KillerCamp — Kathy Jane Cooper (@katjcoops1) October 28, 2019

Speaking from beyond the grave, Warren later gave insight into who he believes the murder.

‘I think Sam is the killer,’ he revealed. ‘The reason why I think Sam is the killer and I have done from the start is because the clues match up to him far too well, far too well to be true.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Warren added: ‘He’s too calm, cold and calculated. All the campmates look to him for support. To me, that stinks mate.’

Is Warren right? Only time will tell…

Killer Camp continues tomorrow at 9pm on ITV2.

description: ITV2's Killer Camp contestant Warren killed off when huge penis impales eye in outrageous scenes.
